alert.note: Alert for Northwest Carter; Sullivan; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:06PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sullivan, northeastern Washington and west central Carter Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 606 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oak Grove, or near Johnson City, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Elizabethton, Gray, Oak Grove, Central, Spurgeon, Walnut Hill and Bluff City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
